testcase.classname: End to End tests for Online Book store API
testcase.name: the Authorized user can Add a book.
testcase.system-out: Given I am an authorized user...............................................passed Given A list of books are available.........................................passed When I add a book to my reading list........................................passed Then the book is added......................................................passed

testcase.classname: End to End tests for Online Book store API
testcase.name: the Authorized user can Remove a book.
testcase.system-out: Given I am an authorized user...............................................passed Given A list of books are available.........................................passed When I add a book to my reading list........................................passed When I remove a book from my reading list...................................passed Then the book is removed....................................................passed
